General.Name: J.Pond Precision Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: J.Pond Precision Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision functional and structural parts. It offers flexible composite material precision functional structural parts for use in laptop keyboards; microcomputer interface multifunctional flexible shielding filler parts for desktop mainboards; and FPC motherboard profiling multifunctional heat shielding for use in smart speaker, and heat dissipation module. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China with additional offices in Shenzhen, Ziyang, Kunshan, and Suzhou, China; Sheung Wan, Hong Kong; and Santa Clara, California;
